items.text: Include this API key in all your requests and check it on the server side before sending any response back.
items.href: security - Best way to secure Android app sensitive Data? - Stack Overflow

items.text: Remember that since you're using HTTPS, an attacker would not be able to just use a network sniffer to find out your API key.
items.href: security - Best way to secure Android app sensitive Data? - Stack Overflow

items.text: You can generate a key every time you send a request.
items.href: security - Best way to secure Android app sensitive Data? - Stack Overflow

items.text: That key would be generated by using a bit of logic that only you know, so that you can implement it client- and server-side as well.
items.href: security - Best way to secure Android app sensitive Data? - Stack Overflow

items.text: The only real way of securing your data is by asking your user for a password, besides doing all the work I wrote about above.
